## Description
Improve widget endpoints, update tests, and handle unknown widget types gracefully.

## Current Issues
- Widget API lacks standardization
- Unknown widget types cause errors
- Test coverage is incomplete
- Performance issues with many widgets

## API Improvements
### Endpoints
- GET /api/widgets - List available widgets
- GET /api/widgets/:id - Get widget data
- POST /api/widgets/:id/config - Update widget config
- GET /api/dashboard/layout - Get user layout
- PUT /api/dashboard/layout - Save user layout

### Data Format
```json
{

: []
  }
}
```

## Error Handling
- Unknown widget types return placeholder
- Graceful degradation for missing data
- Client-side error boundaries
- Detailed error logging

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All widget endpoints follow RESTful standards
- [ ] Unknown widget types show placeholder widget
- [ ] API responses include versioning
- [ ] Pagination works for widget lists
- [ ] Caching headers optimize performance
- [ ] WebSocket updates for real-time data
- [ ] Comprehensive test coverage (>90%)
- [ ] API documentation is complete
- [ ] Performance metrics meet targets
- [ ] Error responses follow standard format

## Performance Requirements
- Widget list loads in < 200ms
- Individual widget data in < 100ms
- Layout saves in < 300ms
- WebSocket latency < 50ms

## Testing Requirements
- Unit tests for all endpoints
- Integration tests for widget lifecycle
- Load tests with 50+ widgets
- Error scenario tests
- WebSocket connection tests
